attributes.action: LOOTERS WORSE THAN PAEDOPHILES? WE THINK NOT!!
attributes.additional_details:
WITH DUE RESPECT WE FEEL THAT THE OUTRAGE, SENTENCING AND TOUGH STANCE SERVED ON THOSE WHO HAVE LOOTED SHOULD NOW BE SERVED UPON PAEDOPHILES, MURDERERS AND RAPISTS.
IF YOU ARE GOING TO PROVE THAT YOU WILL NOT TOLERATE IMMORAL BEHAVIOUR THEN IT'S TIME TO PRIORITISE.
WHILST LOOTING AND RIOTING IS TOTALLY WRONG PLEASE SHOW THAT THE TAKING OF A LIFE AND INNOCENCE OF HUMAN BEINGS IS FAR WORSE AND PROVE THIS BY ENSURING THE JUDICIAL SYSTEM METES OUT APPROPRIATE SENTENCING.
PROVE YOU HAVE MORALS AND SHOW US APPROPRIATE SENTENCING FOR THOSE WHO FEEL IT IS 'NORMAL' TO PREY ON THE YOUNG AND VULNERABLE OF SOCIETY IN THE SICKEST AND DESPICABLE WAYS IMAGINABLE.
IMAGINE IF IT WERE YOUR FAMILY!
